overview:
Fadi is a web entrepreneur with product management expertise.

He is currently Co-Founder of iSpicePhotos (http://ispicephotos.com) an iPad app that lets people rediscovers unique experiences using their Facebook photos.

He is also Founder of iltaqi (http://iltaqi.com), a collaborative activities planning web service, created as a solution to the chaos that ensues from attempting to organize friends around activities. Iltaqi’s centralized environment makes it easy to initiate and keep track of any number of activities simultaneously. iltaqi means ‘to meet’ in Arabic.

Previously, Fadi held the position of VP Product Management for Earthone.net, a London-based online aggregator of print-on-demand services. He led the development team, steering the overall product strategy from inception to market.

Fadi holds a Master of Engineering from the Ecole Polytechnique de Montreal, and a Bachelor of Engineering from the American University of Beirut.
